concept.title: Collecting diagnostics via couchbase-cli
concept.shortdesc: You can start, stop, and view status of a diagnostics collection by using the couchbase-cli tool.

section.title: Start log collection command
section.p: The start log collection command initiates a log collection process. You must specify whether to collect logs from all nodes or only specified nodes. You can optionally request the logs to be uploaded to Couchbase. If you request an upload to Couchbase, you must include the name of your organization and optionally a support ticket number.
